title: Usability Resources
content:
Can I get you guys (and gals) to post some links to usability related resources?

Thanks,

Hildebrant.

comments.content:
That’s an old article I wrote some years ago. At the end you can find some links to usability resourses.

[http://www.jazz.futurezone.com/usability\_english.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030726/http:/www.jazz.futurezone.com/usability_english.htm "http://www.jazz.futurezone.com/usability\_english.htm")

Cheers.

Ramiro.
Usability in what context? Application design? Product design? Type design? Web design?

[http://www.useit.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030726/http:/www.useit.com/ "http://www.useit.com/")

But cover your eyes. Jakob has always interesting points but in my opinion is a poor designer. I mean the web isn’t print, there’s no excuse, what you see on the screen is what others will see too. Ah well. Use a browser like Lynx :)

[http://rosendorf.us/blogdorf/archive/2004/12/15/147.aspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030726/http:/rosendorf.us/blogdorf/archive/2004/12/15/147.aspx "http://rosendorf.us/blogdorf/archive/2004/12/15/147.aspx")

_“Good web design means that you don’t have to user test”_  
Edward Tufte on user testing and analytical design.

Listed below are a few usability websites out of my bookmarks. Hope you find them useful.

Usability Expert Jakob Nielsen’s website:  
 [http://www.useit.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030726/http:/www.useit.com/ "http://www.useit.com/")

Usability Expert Bruce Tognazzini’s website:  
 [http://www.asktog.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030726/http:/www.asktog.com/ "http://www.asktog.com/")

Outdated but nevertheless comprehensive database of some very useful websites on user interface design and information architecture:  
 [http://www.usableweb.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030726/http:/www.usableweb.com/ "http://www.usableweb.com/")

An association for Usability professionals worldwide. You’ll need membership but I say its worth it.  
 [http://www.upassoc.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030726/http:/www.upassoc.org/ "http://www.upassoc.org/")

Resource for techniques on usability testing and heuristic evaluation:  
 [http://jthom.best.vwh.net/usability/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030726/http:/jthom.best.vwh.net/usability/ "http://jthom.best.vwh.net/usability/")

An HCI (human computer interaction) portal:  
 [http://www.hcibib.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030726/http:/www.hcibib.org/ "http://www.hcibib.org/")

Resources for user interface design  
 [http://gui-designers.co.uk/resources/resources.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030726/http:/gui-designers.co.uk/resources/resources.htm "http://gui-designers.co.uk/resources/resources.htm")

A very useful (and well designed too!) webzine on UI design:  
 [http://www.uigarden.net/english/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030726/http:/www.uigarden.net/english/ "http://www.uigarden.net/english/")
Thanks guys, these will prove to be very helpful.
